titleStmt.title: John Boyle to R. C. Hewitt
CWG14179

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p:
256
Novr 10" 3.
Dr R. C. Hewitt
Chairman Med. Board
Louisville, Ky.
Sir,
Your Board will examine Dr J. R. Hutchinson touching his qualifications for the place of Surgeon, he having Procured the necessary evidence of his loyalty and good moral character to the Governor.-

Respy
Yours obedt Servant
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
